'''The Great Adventurer Stanley''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during [[Venti]]'s [[Story Quest]] [[Carmen Dei Chapter]] Act I - [[Should You Be Trapped in a Windless Land]] quest ''[[The South Wind Brings Adventure]]''. It takes place in the [[Temple of the Lion]].

==Walkthrough==
# Use Venti's Elemental Skill (Hold) to generate a wind current and glide onto the elevator, moving up to the next room.
# Activate the device to open the door. There is a Common Chest near the Door of Resurrection.
# Defeat the Hilichurls before the next door.
# Defeat the Samachurl and Hilichurls in the next room. There is a Common Chest in the northern corner of the room.
# Defeat the Cryo Abyss Mage and Hilichurls in the next room.
# Talk to Jack and Stanley. There is a Common Chest behind them.
# Use the wind current to glide up to the next room.
# Activate the 4 Anemo totems at the same time by using Venti's skill to generate a wind current next to the locked device. A Common Chest spawns next to the Anemo totems after unlocking the device.
# Activate the unlocked device to open the door.
# Defeat the Mitachurl and Hilichurls in the next room.
# Use Venti's skill to generate a wind current, glide up, and go through the white rings in the air to reach the final room.
# Defeat the Pyro Abyss Mage and Hydro Abyss Mage. There is a Precious Chest between the mages.
